title: All Ball - KD Dominance, Rick Carlisle Exit -- Pt. 2: Georgia Tech HC Josh Pastner on Coach Cal's Shadow, Pressure, Leaving for Tech
itunes:title: All Ball - KD Dominance, Rick Carlisle Exit -- Pt. 2: Georgia Tech HC Josh Pastner on Coach Cal's Shadow, Pressure, Leaving for Tech
description:
In this episode, Doug gives some quick takes on KD's dominant performance against the Bucks, and Rick Carlisle's sits down with Georgia Tech Head Coach Josh Pastner for the second part of a three part interview, where they installment of a multiple part interview, where he goes inside the whirlwind process that ended with him getting the Memphis job, how he established his own identity, the pressure of following Coach Cal, and why he decided to take the Georgia Tech job. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
